Ilhan Omar: s father, Nur Omar Mohamed, entered the U.S. legally and obtained asylum status in 1995.
There is no evidence to support the clai: s father was a war criminal or connected to the former dictator in Somalia, Siad Barre.
The conspiracy theory linking Omar: s father to war crimes in Somalia is based on a false conflation with an unrelated Somali man, Yusuf Abdi Ali.
The claim that Omar: s father is living in the U.S. illegally is false, as he arrived in 1996 on a spousal visa and has no known connection to Ali or any war crimes.
